text:
After having installed the JBoss-2.2.2_Tomcat-3.2.2 everything seems to work OK 
except user authentication. I face this problem trying to run the provided jsp 
examples (check the Security sample). Neither default form-based nor basic 
method seem to work. None of the users in %TOMCAT_HOME%/conf/tomcat-users.xml 
seems to be accepted.
creator: gbt@mkt.no

text:
This is not really a bug. The problem is due to illegal setup by the JBoss 
distribution of Tomcat v3.2.2 . The problem can be fixed by exchanging the 
following line from ${TOMCAT_HOME}/conf/server.xml :

<RequestInterceptor 
className="org.jboss.tomcat.security.JBossSecurityMgrRealm" />

with these lines :

<RequestInterceptor className="org.apache.tomcat.request.SimpleRealm" />
<RequestInterceptor className="org.jboss.tomcat.security.JbossRealm" />
creator: gbt@mkt.no
